short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy URL to clipboard stripping away unnecessary query parameters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say goodbye to unwieldy, cluttered URLs! CleanLink is the must-have browser extension for anyone who values simplicity and privacy. With just a click, CleanLink effortlessly transforms any URL into its pristine, tracking-free form, stripping away unnecessary query parameters and ensuring a clean, focused browsing experience.
